items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants bonuses to damage and critical strike chance of spells to you and your allies, and gives a chance to create Consecrated Ground against stronger enemies.
explicitMods: +1.8 metres to radius
You and nearby Non-Minion Allies have a 10% chance to create Consecrated Ground on Hitting a Rare or Unique Enemy, lasting 8 seconds
You and nearby Allies have +2% to Critical Strike Multiplier
You and nearby allies have 38% increased Spell Critical Strike Chance
You and nearby allies deal 15% more Spell Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 19% more Fire Damage
Supported Skills have 25% chance to Ignite
Supported Skills deal 20% increased Fire Damage
Ignites from Supported Skills deal Damage 10% slower
Enemies Ignited by Supported Skills have -10% to Fire Resistance
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Fire, Physical, Guard

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that adds to your armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around you based on the total damage that was taken from the buff. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods: Base duration is 3.00 seconds
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect

75% of Damage from Hits is taken from the Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to 15% of your Armour, up to a maximum of 5000
Reflects 2740% of Damage taken from Buff as Fire Damage when Buff expires or is depleted
Buff grants +786 to Armour
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText:
Must support both a skill that creates minions which can be damaged, and
 an aura skill that creates permanent auras around you.
Cannot support triggered skills, banner skills or stance skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 24% increased Aura effect
Minions from Supported Skills Regenerate 2% of Life per second
Supported Aura Skills have no Reservation

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Supported Skills cannot apply Auras on you unless you have Minions from a Supported Skill
Minions from Supported Skills take 14% of their total Maximum Life and Energy Shield as Physical Damage per second while you have an Aura from a Supported Skill on you
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.8 metres to radius
You and nearby allies gain 25% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
You and nearby Allies have 10% increased Chill and Freeze Duration
You and nearby allies deal 18% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons an Ancestor Totem which attacks enemies with melee strikes while you're near it. Being near it grants you more attack speed. Requires a Melee Weapon or Unarmed.
explicitMods: Totem lasts 12 seconds
Summons a Totem which uses this Skill
19% more Attack Speed while Totem is Active
50% increased Totem Placement speed
+1.8 metres to Melee Strike Range
20% increased Effect of Ancestor Totem Buff
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Pyroshock Clasp
explicitMods: +36 to Dexterity
+445 to Evasion Rating
14% increased Duration of Elemental Ailments on Enemies
Enemies Ignited by you have 15% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Fire
Enemies Shocked by you have 13% of Physical Damage they deal converted to Lightning
flavourText: Teach a man to burn, and you'll be warm for the rest of his life.

items.typeLine: Alchemist's Quicksilver Flask of the Lynx
explicitMods: 25% reduced Duration
25% increased effect
11% increased Movement Speed during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.typeLine: Terrified Divine Life Flask of Sealing
explicitMods: 15% reduced Amount Recovered
Instant Recovery when on Low Life

Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 8 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 8 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Honour Bead
explicitMods: 5% chance to receive additional Talismans when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
16% chance in Heists for Orbs of Alteration to drop as Orbs of Alchemy instead
2% chance in Heists for Regal Orbs to drop as Divine Orbs instead
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this
